Based on All Info Block by Alex Hession. Major modifications made by DJMaze
Francisco Burzi registers the PHP-Nuke project at SourceForge, releasing version 1.0
Coppermine project rescued by forum members after the author disappears. He was later found and was thankful for their efforts
CPG-Nuke is born, coined as CPG-Nuke 6.5 CPG
Last cross-platform release (1.2b) of Coppermine for CMS from the authors of CPG-Nuke
cpgnuke.com, the official site of CPG-Nuke is launched
pitcher.no becomes official support site for CPG-Nuke in Norway
cpgnuke.com goes offline during the release of 8.1.1 as a result of a bad web host
Despite cpgnuke.com being offline version 8.1.1 is still released through cpgnuke.de, pitcher.no and nukephotogallery.com
cpgnuke.com resumes operation with the help of webdev1, getting us a sponsored server through DedicatedNOW
The 8.2 series of CPG-Nuke is introduced
CPG-Nuke 8.2b is released, a maintenance release for 8.2a
OpenSpirit name created for the release of 9.0
OpenSpirit name found to be taken already
Dragonfly™ is created to replace OpenSpirit

Impolite bandwidth sucker. Netblock owned by SOFTBANK BB CORP, Japan. Doesn't follow robots.txt
Impolite robot. Netblock owned by Convera Corp, Vienna
Claria (ex Gator) robot (64.152.73.xx, NULL), s. also Claria
Some sort of application that tries to download and store your full website. Doesn't follow robots.txt

Originally, the Indy Library is a programming library which is available at http://www.nevrona.com/Indy or http://indy.torry.net under an Open Source license. This library is included with Borland Delphi 6, 7, C++Builder 6, plus all of the Kylix versions. Unfortunately, this library is hi-jacked and abused by some Chinese spam bots. All recent user-agents with the unmodified "Indy Library" string were of Chinese origin. Doesn't follow robots.txt

Medusa is a tool for finding images, movie-clips or other kinds of files on webpages and downloading them. You start by entering a starting URL and Medusa searches for the filetypes you are interested in on this page and all pages found up to a given depth. Doesn't follow robots.txt
Some spam bot from Jasmine Internet - Bangkok. Doesn't follow robots.txt
This agent is used to exploit your system regarding the following security issue in FrontPage2000: http://lists.grok.org.uk/pipermail/full-disclosure/2004-December/030467.html
A Windows offline browser that allows you to download an unlimited number of your favorite Web and FTP sites for later offline viewing, editing or browsing.
ThePlanet/jaja-jak-globusy.com Google Adsense refferer spam bot. Doesn't follow robots.txt
Snoopy is a PHP class that simulates a web browser. It automates the task of retrieving web page content and posting forms, for example.
Yahoo Search user agent or spider. Doesn't follow robots.txt
Syntryx Solution Suite - domain / keyword crawler. Doesn't follow robots.txt
p2p-based distributed Web Search Engine. Doesn't follow robots.txt
1noon.com search Korea robot. Doesn't follow robots.txt
